newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia Treasury says jobs target unchanged.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia Treasury says jobs target unchanged.

text.p: The Australian Treasury said on Wednesday it had no reason to revise its employment rate forecast for the 1996/97 year since the release of the mid-year budget review on January 28.

Asked by Australian Opposition finance spokesman Nick Sherry at a Senate Committee hearing whether there had been any reason for Treasury to change its view since the mid-year review, senior Treasury forecaster Martin Parkinson said: "No, senator."
In the mid-year budget review, the government maintained its forecast for employment growth of 1.75 percent in the 1996/97 financial year. -- Canberra Bureau 61-6 273-2730
